TextBlock.Text: DAHLIA: I decided to go to this crater, the one with a single tree in particular.
DAHLIA: Water. A lot of water.
DAHLIA: Interestingly, it seems the tree's size prevented others from growing. It also seems to have no intrest in reproducing.
DAHLIA: Hypothesis: This tree, and the other flora and fauna on Familliar Refuse is not of this world.
